verses.kjv: Hear, ye children, the instruction of a father, and attend to know understanding.
verses.ct: Children, pay attention to your father's teaching, and focus so you can gain true understanding.

verses.kjv: For I give you good doctrine, forsake ye not my law.
verses.ct: What I'm giving you is solid guidance, so don't abandon my instruction.

verses.kjv: For I was my father’s son, tender and only beloved in the sight of my mother.
verses.ct: I was once a young boy to my father too — my mother's precious only child.

verses.kjv: He taught me also, and said unto me, Let thine heart retain my words: keep my commandments, and live.
verses.ct: My father taught me and said, 'Hold on to my words with all your heart. Follow my commands, and you will truly live.'

verses.kjv: Get wisdom, get understanding: forget it not; neither decline from the words of my mouth.
verses.ct: 'Go after wisdom, go after understanding. Don't forget what I've said, and don't turn away from my words.'

verses.kjv: Forsake her not, and she shall preserve thee: love her, and she shall keep thee.
verses.ct: 'Don't abandon wisdom, and she will protect you. Love her, and she will watch over you.'

verses.kjv: Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom: and with all thy getting get understanding.
verses.ct: 'Wisdom is the most important thing, so pursue wisdom. And whatever else you acquire, acquire understanding.'

verses.kjv: Exalt her, and she shall promote thee: she shall bring thee to honour, when thou dost embrace her.
verses.ct: 'Value her highly, and she will lift you up. She will bring you honor when you hold her close.'

verses.kjv: She shall give to thine head an ornament of grace: a crown of glory shall she deliver to thee.
verses.ct: 'She will place a graceful wreath on your head and present you with a crown of glory.'

verses.kjv: Hear, O my son, and receive my sayings; and the years of thy life shall be many.
verses.ct: Listen, my son, and take in what I say, and you will live a long life.

verses.kjv: I have taught thee in the way of wisdom; I have led thee in right paths.
verses.ct: I have shown you the path of wisdom and guided you along the right roads.

verses.kjv: When thou goest, thy steps shall not be straitened; and when thou runnest, thou shalt not stumble.
verses.ct: As you walk, nothing will block your steps, and when you run, you won't trip and fall.

verses.kjv: Take fast hold of instruction; let her not go: keep her; for she is thy life.
verses.ct: Grip instruction tightly and don't let go. Guard it carefully, because it is your life.

verses.kjv: Enter not into the path of the wicked, and go not in the way of evil men.
verses.ct: Don't set foot on the road that wicked people travel, and don't walk the direction evil people go.

verses.kjv: Avoid it, pass not by it, turn from it, and pass away.
verses.ct: Stay away from it completely — don't even go near it. Turn from it and keep moving.

verses.kjv: For they sleep not, except they have done mischief; and their sleep is taken away, unless they cause some to fall.
verses.ct: Those people can't sleep unless they've caused harm. Sleep escapes them unless they've dragged someone down.

verses.kjv: For they eat the bread of wickedness, and drink the wine of violence.
verses.ct: Wickedness is the food they eat, and violence is the drink they consume.

verses.kjv: But the path of the just is as the shining light, that shineth more and more unto the perfect day.
verses.ct: But the road that righteous people walk is like the first light of dawn, growing brighter and brighter until full daylight.

verses.kjv: The way of the wicked is as darkness: they know not at what they stumble.
verses.ct: The road of the wicked is like total darkness — they can't even see what makes them stumble.

verses.kjv: My son, attend to my words; incline thine ear unto my sayings.
verses.ct: My son, give your full attention to my words. Open your ears to what I'm telling you.

verses.kjv: Let them not depart from thine eyes; keep them in the midst of thine heart.
verses.ct: Never let them out of your sight. Keep them deep within your heart.

verses.kjv: For they are life unto those that find them, and health to all their flesh.
verses.ct: They bring life to everyone who discovers them and healing to their whole body.

verses.kjv: Keep thy heart with all diligence; for out of it are the issues of life.
verses.ct: Guard your heart above everything else, because everything you do flows from it.

verses.kjv: Put away from thee a froward mouth, and perverse lips put far from thee.
verses.ct: Get rid of dishonest speech, and keep deceptive talk far from you.

verses.kjv: Let thine eyes look right on, and let thine eyelids look straight before thee.
verses.ct: Keep your eyes focused straight ahead, and fix your gaze directly in front of you.

verses.kjv: Ponder the path of thy feet, and let all thy ways be established.
verses.ct: Think carefully about the path you're walking, and make sure all your ways are on solid ground.

verses.kjv: Turn not to the right hand nor to the left: remove thy foot from evil.
verses.ct: Don't veer off to the right or the left. Keep your feet far from evil.
